Module.Content: <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="Pick Your DAW" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#000000; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>Pick Your DAW</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/ableton">Ableton</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/acid-pro">Acid Pro</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/audacity">Audacity</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/cakewalk">Cakewalk</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/cubase">Cubase</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/garage-band">Garage Band</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/logic">Logic</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/n-track">N-Track</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/nuendo">Nuendo</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/presonus-studio-one">Presonus Studio One</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/pro-tools">Pro Tools</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/reaper">Reaper</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/reason">Reason</option></select> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjamstudiosmusicprojects/daw-specific-discussions/tascam">Tascam</option></select>
